com.linkedin.paldb.api

Class PalDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linkedin.paldb.api.PalDB

  • public final class PalDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for store readers and writers.

    This class is the entry point to obtain StoreReader and StoreWriter interfaces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Creates a store writer with the specified file as destination with a default configuration.

      Creates a store writer with the specified file as destination.

        public static StoreReader createReader(java.io.File file)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a store reader

                                       Configuration config)
        Creates a store reader from the specified file.

        file - a PalDB store file
        config - configuration

      • createReader

        public static StoreReader createReader(java.io.InputStream stream,
                                       Configuration config)
        Creates a store reader from the specified stream.

        The reader will read the stream and write its content to a temporary file when this method is called. This is specifically suited for stream coming from the JAR as a resource. The stream will be closed by this method.

        Parameters:
        stream - an input stream on a PalDB store file
        config - configuration
        Returns:
        a store reader

      • createWriter

        public static StoreWriter createWriter(java.io.File file)
        Creates a store writer with the specified file as destination with a default configuration.

        The parent folder is created if missing.

        Parameters:
        file - location of the output file
        Returns:
        a store writer

      • createWriter

        public static StoreWriter createWriter(java.io.File file,
                                       Configuration config)
        Creates a store writer with the specified file as destination.

        The parent folder is created if missing.

        Parameters:
        file - location of the output file
        config - configuration
        Returns:
        a store writer

      • createWriter

        public static StoreWriter createWriter(java.io.OutputStream stream,
                                       Configuration config)
        Creates a store writer with the specified stream as destination.

        The writer will only write bytes to the stream when StoreWriter.close() is called.

        Parameters:
        stream - output stream
        config - configuration
        Returns:
        a store writer

      • newConfiguration

        public static Configuration newConfiguration()
        Creates new configuration with default values.
        Returns:
        new configuration
